video_prompt: Dynamic blink, subtle smile forming, hair strands shifting, glasses subtly reflecting changing light. Background text and symbols subtly flicker and rearrange.  The "D" on the left slightly morphs and vibrates.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Close-up anime character portrait, short dark green hair, large expressive green eyes, clear futuristic glasses, light skin, slightly parted lips, small upturned nose, dark earring, black choker with silver buckle, white crew-neck t-shirt. Vibrant neon green background with abstract light gray text, black Japanese character "市", and stylized dark green "D". Modern anime aesthetic, vibrant colors. Vertical image.
refined_video_prompt: Eyes dynamically blink. A subtle smile gently forms. Hair strands softly shift. Glasses subtly reflect changing light. Background text and symbols flicker and subtly rearrange. A 'D' on the left side perceptibly morphs and vibrates.
